calc_intro:
Do you want to do your training part-time?
This calculator helps you.
You can see how long your training will take.
label_fulltime_hours: How many hours per week is full-time?
info_fulltime_hours: Full-time is usually 38 to 40 hours per week.
label_parttime_hours: How many hours per week do you want to work?
info_parttime_hours: Part-time means fewer hours than full-time.
label_training_duration: How long is the training in full-time?
question_parttime_start: How do you start your training?
option_parttime_later: I start full-time and change to part-time later
info_parttime_start: Enter 0 if you start part-time right away.
step2_title: Step 2: Can your training be shorter?
info_age: If you are older than 21, your training may be shorter.
question_school: What is your highest school degree?
info_school: A higher school degree can shorten your training.
info_experience: For example from a job or internship.
question_apprenticeship: Have you finished a training before?
info_apprenticeship: A finished training can shorten your new one.
question_study: Did you study at a college or university and earn at least 30 ECTS (credit points) there?
info_study: Some study courses can be counted.
question_childcare: Do you take care of children?
info_childcare: Child care can be a reason for part-time training.
question_familycare: Do you take care of relatives?
result_served_copy: You work full-time first, then part-time.
result_remaining_copy: This time is still left in full-time.
result_remaining_detail: This is the remaining time after all reductions.
result_parttime_copy: Working fewer hours can make training longer.
result_parttime_detail_zero: Changing from {full}h to {part}h per week leads to only a small extension.
result_parttime_detail_extend: Changing from {full}h to {part}h per week makes the training {months} months longer.
result_early_body: Very good performance can shorten training by 6 months.
disclaimer_text: The result is only for guidance.
disclaimer_more: You can find a detailed explanation on our page.
result_extension_cap:
⚠️ Warning: The total duration may only be extended by half of the regular training duration (max. {maxAllowedTotalDuration} months).
Solution: Increase the part-time hours per week.
pdf_summary_extension: Extra time due to part-time: {value} months
pdf_footer_note: Note: This result is only for guidance.
error_fulltime_range: The value must be between 35 and 48.
error_parttime_minimum: Part-time must be at least 50% of full-time (min. {min} hours).
error_parttime_less_than_full: The value must be less than full-time.
error_number_positive: Please enter a number greater than 0.
error_months_less_than: The value must be less than max months.
privacy_text_1: Your data stays on your device.
privacy_text_2: Nothing is sent to a server.
privacy_point_2: All data is deleted when you close the page.
privacy_text_3: The data is only needed while you use the calculator.
